"if u spread this to the public u know you are a fag, fag"
what the hell is that supposed to mean? it is YOU who are "spreading it to the public" Who do you THINK downloads these things? Do you think a few words nullifies what you do? Why do you even feel the need? Do it or don't, but don' t try to weasel out of it
